name: Unicycle
description:
Frantically peddle your unicycle against a beautiful sunset backdrop, collecting mysterious floaty balls to restore your stamina along the way. How far can you get before you crash?

Controls Action Keyboard Touch Gamepad Cycle Left & Right Arrows Tap Left & Right side of screen D-pad or Shoulder buttons Left & Right Jump Up or Space Bar Flick Up A Drop Down Flick Down B -Music-

"EDM Detection Mode"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
